data.text: As wildfires, accelerated by high temperatures & drought, ravage Australia, @UNEP explores the risks posed by megafires exacerbated by the climate crisis. https://t.co/h9RPregeR4

2020 starts the Decade of Action for the #GlobalGoals.

Here are 17 New Year's resolutions for you to help make the world a better place for everyone: https://t.co/hJ3cKZQyGh https://t.co/ihw7fMY5ko

When a young migrant family, including a heavily-pregnant woman, set out to return home to Sierra Leone in difficult conditions, @UNMigration's medical team helped them with urgent medical & labour assistance in their hour of need.
https://t.co/VZkedQeH4z

From damage assessments to long-term recovery support, see how @UNDP & partners are helping people in Albania rebuild their lives after a 6.4 magnitude earthquake hit the country in late November. https://t.co/5N900U7ex1 https://t.co/N2j7gm5VwR

"Climate change is the single greatest security & development threat facing Small Island Developing States, despite this being a crisis not of their making."

-- @UN_PGA at @IRENA high-level meeting in the United Arab Emirates. https://t.co/zVszLJBSVe
Syria: UN operation that delivers humanitarian aid to millions of civilians will continue following Security Council vote. https://t.co/rgOD94oSvh

1/3 of our food is lost or wasted every year.

Here's how you can help reduce food waste:
🛒Shop smart
📅Understand dates on food
🍏Buy 'ugly' fruit & vegetables

In 2020, we celebrate

➡️5 years #GlobalGoals
➡️10 years @UN_Women
➡️20 years Security Council resolution on women, peace & security #UNSCR1325
➡️75 years UN

and many more opportunities for #GenerationEquality to move closer to gender equality.
https://t.co/jTQ3fbuyDP

20+ million people in Yemen face hunger.
Every month, @WFP distributes 130,000 metric tons of food in the country.
That's the same weight as 21,666 elephants. 🐘🐘 https://t.co/F83gyUNUjX #ZeroHunger https://t.co/kliRmlAATI

The climate emergency is making extreme weather events like droughts, heatwaves and bushfires more intense and more likely.

Taking urgent #ClimateAction can help curb the severity of these catastrophes. More from @UNEP: https://t.co/gv2AG5IaHP https://t.co/jGBq37TaCz

"War is never inevitable; it is a matter of choice, and often it is the product of easy miscalculations.

Peace, too, is never inevitable; it is the product of hard work and we must never take it for granted."

-- @antonioguterres tells Security Council. https://t.co/93ZibMqcvC https://t.co/SxAuSd31Ln
